entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
